A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was so bad\, they made the guy with the ugliest face take off his shirt to show his firm\, hard\, beautiful chest. That was worth slipping $5 in his g-string.  However\, I could've saved the rest of the money and went to a Woman Studies class and got man-bashed for free. White people bad\, evil.  Everyone else\, good\, smart. Yeah. I got it.  The plot?  There was a plot?  Seriously?  No. The story starts off in an alternate Universe\, nowhere close to the ending of the last one\, and ends up\, nowhere close to anything I want to see next.
